content.d: Rina, your TV, it’s so big!
Alright, what should we play? I’m not gonna lose.
Metal War Drift, Skydriver, Monster Viking, Hedgehog Fire......
Eh? That’s the one where you build a town for dogs, right?
Competing is fine, but... I want to create something together with Mia-chan.
Rina...! Yeah, I want to do that too!!
Ehehe. Let’s build the world’s biggest doghouse. Rina-chan Board says, “Determined!”
